title: Is We Dumb? | Tamale. Patty Cake. Crustacean. Tornado.
description:
Have you ever visited a notoriously giant museum just to later go online and complain about how big it is? Let's talk about that, our new knockoff version of TED Talks, lobsters with giant knockers, playing patty cake in a funeral home, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/9Ox5G0gx_OM
